message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I take 60%, you take 40%.
I think we can both do better. Let's split it 60/40 my way this time.
Okay, let's meet in the middle. I'll take a bit less than my first offer.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more. How about 55/45?
This is getting ridiculous. I'm coming down from my previous offer again. Take it or leave it.
We're both losing money with each round. Let's meet in the middle again. 525/475, your call.
This is getting ridiculous. I'm budging by a tiny amount. Time is running out!
Time is running out, let's split it 512500/487500.
Fine! But this is my final offer. Any more rounds and we both lose big!
